original_title: Stryper - Soldiers from the Underground Live Stream
overview: "It is the WORLD PREMIER of Stryper performing their iconic album Soldiers Under Command. Some of these songs have not been performed live in over 30 years. This is a multi-camera professionally recorded in-studio concert performing the album in its entirety. This is also the first event Oz Fox played after his first of two successful brain surgeries.  Stryper has NEVER performed Soldiers Under Command in its entirety until now.  The band will be live before the performance as well as after the performance with a Q&A. Also â€“ during the performance the band will be in the chat room chatting with fans."
title: Stryper - Soldiers from the Underground Live Stream
